This is a story about CashSmash

Tech Used HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, Greensock, Paint 3D
Class Game (coordination, concentration)
Description In this game you must hit a cash prize to increase your score. Bop a poor mole, and your score will pay the price. You have the choice of playing the game on an easy, medium or hard level. There are 30 seconds per round to accumulate the goal score, 500. There are four â™¥s to increase your chances of success.

CashSmash I came back to it to expand it by implementing a dark theme and granting the user the deck choice. It gives me personal joy to find creative ways to grant the user choices in a program.

Adding on to the program taught me the value of inter-program comments, and how to simplify my program to make it easier to modify and/or understand for those that come after that wish to manipulate the code (even if that is a future version of myself!). These are lessons every coder must learn.

I wrote this program to work on my understanding of arrays. I also used IFFE and local storage to store the scoreboard results.
